text: 10:25 Rom 13:11; Filipai 4:5; Hibru 3:13; 2 Pita 3:9-11; 3:14Ezɨ e Godɨn gumazamiziba, e uari akuvir arazim ataghɨraghan kogham, mati gumazamizir maba ami mokɨn. Kamaghɨn markɨ. E fo, Dughiar Ekiam Gumazamiziba Tuisɨghamim, a roghɨra izi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e vaghvagh pamtem ingarɨva, igharaz darazir akurvagh egh gavgavim me danɨngam.
